==== Notes ====

During the installation the disk are detect as /dev/sdi and /dev/sdj the same problem like described ../SunGalaxyX4100 .

You don't need to change menu.list because grub use UUID, but I get some problem when booting after installation, You need to change the on menu.list root(hd1,0) to root(hd0,0).
